snippet: Officials said they are looking into whether senior enlisted sailors training on nuclear reactors have been cheating on written tests, adding to the list of recent military cheating scandals.
abstract: United States Navy says it has begun investigation into whether senior enlisted sailors training on nuclear reactors had been cheating on written tests, adding to list of recent military cheating scandals.
lead_paragraph: Officials said they are looking into whether senior enlisted sailors training on nuclear reactors have been cheating on written tests, adding to the list of recent military cheating scandals.

headline.main: Navy Opens Inquiry Into Cheating in Reactor Training
headline.print_headline: Navy Opens Inquiry Into Cheating in Reactor Training

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
